title: Multiplicative inverse
text: For any real number a, $$\frac{1}{a}$$ is the multiplicative inverse of a. $$a \frac{1}{a}=1$$.
speech: For any real number a,  1 over a,  is the multiplicative inverse of a.  a 1 over a is equal to 1 .

title: Reciprocal of $$-1.1$$
text: To find $$\frac{1}{\left(-1.1\right)}$$, it is easier to write $$-1.1$$ in fractional form first, and then reverse the fraction. $$-1.1$$ written as a fracion is $$\frac{-11}{10}$$.
